description: Returns detailed architecture analysis with agent specifications, KB requirements, tool integrations, and complexity assessment

toolsNeeded: knowledge base retrieval engine (e.g., Elasticsearch, Pinecone)
example_response.rationale: A manager agent coordinates email intake and dispatches queries to a RAG-enabled subagent that retrieves relevant company policy content. RAG requires a structured and searchable knowledge base (estimated at 200MB for comprehensive policies). Each session likely includes an initial intake, retrieval call, model inference, and follow-up confirmation, averaging 4 API calls. Integrated email tools and vector search/retrieval backends are essential. The chosen GPT-5 Mini tier matches the complexity and scope of the task.
